titles.title: A bill to provide protection, under section 1114 of title 18, United States Code, for field office employees of the Social Security Administration.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 10/29/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to include field office employees of the Social Security Administration within the list of protected officers and employees of the United States. (Increased criminal penalties are imposed for the murder or attempted murder of such officers and employees.)
